feed.title: Voyager Releases

entry.title: New release for Voyager: 2.18.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix block crash with v0.19 by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1615

Full Changelog: https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/compare/2.18.0...2.18.1

entry.title: New release for Voyager: 2.18.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Revert ionic upgrade, breaks ios swipeable modals by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1616

Full Changelog: https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/compare/2.18.1...2.18.2

entry.title: New release for Voyager: 2.18.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix not found fedilink not showing error message by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1617
  • Fix overscroll on join server dialog by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1618
  • Upgrade dependencies by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1626
  • Remove unecessary build config (attempt to fix dark mode icons not shâ€¦ by @aeharding in https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/pull/1627

Full Changelog: https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/compare/2.18.2...2.18.3

entry.title: New release for Voyager: 2.18.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

Full Changelog: https://github.com/aeharding/voyager/compare/2.18.3...2.18.4
